appRoles.description: Allows the app to send which accounts are managed by the PAM solution for all AD and Entra identities for MDI customers.
appRoles.displayName: Send which accounts are managed by the PAM solution

appRoles.description: Allows the app to get a list of actions required on AD and Entra identities and update on the status of said actions for MDI customers.
appRoles.displayName: get a list of actions and update on the status of said actions
